snippet: An F.B.I. agent who spent a year under cover as part of a political corruption investigation testified against State Assemblyman William F. Boyland Jr., who is on trial on corruption charges.
abstract: Federal Bureau of Investigation agent Brian Getson, who spent a year under cover as part of political corruption investigation, testifies against New York State Assemblyman William F Boyland Jr, who is on trial on corruption charges.
lead_paragraph: An F.B.I. agent who spent a year under cover as part of a political corruption investigation testified against State Assemblyman William F. Boyland Jr., who is on trial on corruption charges.

headline.main: Undercover F.B.I. Agent Testifies in Legislator’s Bribery Case
headline.print_headline: Undercover F.B.I. Agent Testifies in Legislator’s Bribery Case
